headline: Universal Health Services, Inc. Appoints Darren Lehrich as Vice President of Investor Relations
summary: Universal Health Services, Inc. (NYSE: UHS), one of the largest and most respected providers of hospital and healthcare services, announced today that Darren Lehrich has joined as Vice President of Investor Relations. Lehrich reports to CFO Steve Filton in the newly established investor relations role.
